home.title: trakR
home.subtitle: The Financial Tracker - For Android
home.description: Keep track of your purchases and the location where you made them.

content.title: TD Coding Challenge
content.description: trakR was build for the Fanshawe Winter 2014 TD Coding Challenge, in which it placed second place.  It was inspired and designed around Google's new Material Design concept.  It is a proof of concept app for the tracking and visualization of your purchasing and spending habits.
content.extra_info: For a full list of features please check out the features tab!
